item.title: The Right Bike For the Job, with Rick Schroeder
item.description: Rick Schroeder joins the show to talk bicycle gear and cycling culture.
item.itunes:summary: Rick Schroeder joins the show to talk bicycle gear and cycling culture.
item.content:encoded:
Rick Schroeder joins the show to talk bicycle gear and cycling culture.

Show Notes:

item.title: Board of New Words, with Asia Yisrael and Ciara Pulliam
item.description: Asia Yisrael and Ciara Pulliam join forces to decide on the value – or lack thereof – of new slang words.

item.title: The Future of Fitness, with Misael Contreras
item.description: Misael Contreras joins the inaugural episode of The Bonus Show to discuss exercise tips and tools in a world without gyms.
